description: Enjoy the delightful coconut, custard filling and the melt in your mouth meringue, delicious served with a refreshing cup of tea.
name: Meringue Coconut and Custard Slice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: This delicious slice is not overly sweet, but delightful nonetheless and is best kept refrigerated.
